title: Add Two Numbers with User Input
text: In this example, the user must input two numbers. Then we print the sum by calculating (adding) the two numbers:

Example

  x = input("Type a number: ")y = input("Type another number: ")sum 
  = int(x) + int(y)print("The sum is: ", sum) 
Try it Yourself »

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
x = input("Type a number: ")y = input("Type another number: ")sum 
  = int(x) + int(y)print("The sum is: ", sum)
